key_talking_points: Penalty on Edmonton's Darnell Nurse for high-sticking Sam Bennett. Florida goes to the power play for 2 minutes at 19:23 remaining in the first period.
Florida leads Edmonton 5-4 in the first period.  They are currently outshooting Edmonton 42 to 46.  The early penalty on Nurse gives them a chance to extend that lead on the power play.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game has medium momentum. The penalty against EDM creates an opportunity for FLA to extend their lead early in the game. A close score warrants attention.

game_context.game_situation: FLA leads by 1 in the 1st period

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Florida power play and Edmonton's penalty kill strategy. Discuss the impact of Florida potentially increasing their lead.
